description.en: The data displayed above is part of a broader dataset on COVID-19 cases, which includes data on new cases, imported cases, active cases, and recoveries. Breakdowns by age and vaccination status are also available.
description.bm: Data yang dipaparkan di atas adalah sebahagian daripada dataset tentang kes COVID-19, yang merangkumi data kes baru, kes import, kes aktif, dan kes sembuh. Pecahan mengikut kumpulan umur dan status vaksinasi juga terkandung dalam set data ini.

variables.name: poverty_incidence
variables.desc_en: [Float] The proportion of households in a parliament constituency living below the 2019 Poverty Line Income.
variables.desc_bm: [Float] Peratus daripada isi rumah yang pendapatannya berada di bawah Pendapatan Garis Kemiskinan 2019.

variables.name: gini
variables.desc_en: [Float] The degree of inequality between households.
